directions: Heat oil in heavy large pot over medium heat. Add shallots and sauté until tender and golden brown, about 12 minutes. Add coriander and turmeric and stir 1 minute. Add rice and stir until coated. Add broth and salt; bring to simmer. Cover; reduce heat to low. Cook until rice is tender and liquid is absorbed, about 20 minutes. Stir in parsley. Transfer to platter and serve.
ingredients: 41/2 cups basmati rice or other long-grain white rice
title: Coriander Rice
